Brazil Road Show

December 5 - 9, 2016

São Paulo, Curitiba and Porto Alegre, Brazil

2016 SelectUSA Brazil Road Show

We are happy to announce that the dates and locations for the 2016 Brazil Road Show are set: December 5 - 9 in São Paulo, Curitiba and Porto Alegre.

The Road Show will bring U.S. economic development organizations (EDOs) and service providers together with Brazilian investors via half-day seminars, networking activities (brunches, receptions, etc.), and prearranged, one-on-one matchmaking sessions with decision-makers.

On September 19, we held a briefing call for U.S. EDOs and service providers. Below are the materials used in the call:

  • View the call presentation
  • View the Road Show pamphlet
  • View the briefing call transcript

To find out how to participate, please contact Andre Leal in São Paulo or Rebecca Moudry in Washington, D.C.

Did you know that Brazil is one of the fastest-growing sources of FDI in the United States? The total stock of FDI from Brazil to the United States in 2015 was $23.7 billion. Learn more from our fact sheet.
